text:
[Verse]
Shadows move so slow
In the blue glow night
Feet tap on the road
Dancing in moonlight

[Verse 2]
Stars above so bright
Echoes in the street
Hands are reaching high
Rhythm in the beat

[Chorus]
Moonlight on our faces
Lost in endless spaces
Heartbeats sync and traces
Fuel this night like races

[Verse 3]
Laughter fills the air
Echoes all around
No worries no care
We move without sound

[Verse 4]
Cool breeze on our skin
Music in our soul
Night pulls us within
We lose all control

[Chorus]
Moonlight on our faces
Lost in endless spaces
Heartbeats sync and traces
Fuel this night like races
title: Moonlight Dance
